Worker function to apply filtering

Source: R/dot_functions.R
dot-apply_filter.Rd

Worker function to apply filtering

Usage

.apply_filter(
  object,
  filter_vec,
  exclude,
  slt = c("det", "dep", "tag", "ani", "obs"),
  hard = FALSE
)

Arguments

object

an ATO

filter_vec

a logical vector, normally created by .create_filter_vec.

exclude

FALSE to filter by filter_vec, TRUE to exclude by filter_vec.

slt

the ATO slot to filter

hard

Should the filtering mark rows as invalid (FALSE) or remove them altogether (TRUE)

Value

the updated ATO
